title: Advanced Forging Techniques
description: The blacksmith wants to teach you advanced forging techniques, but first you must prove your dedication.
questText: I see you've proven yourself capable with basic materials. Now I'd like to teach you advanced forging techniques! But first, I need you to gather some premium materials - 5 steel ingots and 10 pieces of coal. This will be much more challenging than iron ore!
completionText: Outstanding! You've shown real dedication to the craft. Here are some advanced tools and a steel sword I forged myself. You're ready for the advanced techniques now!
